testcase.classname: As a registered user (student/parent), I want to have access to the login page from the homepage
testcase.name: On the "userlogin" page, there should be a login window on the left side
testcase.system-out: Given The user goes to the 'url' address....................................passed When The user clicks on the Login button....................................passed Then The user verifies that there are a login window on the left side and information about What's New In Wonder World College on the right side..passed
